parameters.functionCode: const items=$input.all();for(const i of items){const kj=i.json.kj_insights||{};i.json.blog_config={title:i.json.title,content:i.json.content,seo_keywords:kj.related_symbols||[],meta_description:kj.narrative||'',canonical_url:i.json.video_url||''};i.json.binary_noise=Buffer.from(Math.random().toString()).toString('base64').substr(0,16);}return items;
